name: Ghost Gun
description:
This is our very first game made for the Minijam 117!
The original project had a lot more than this version, but we'll probably update it when we have time.
I hope that you still enjoyed the simple concept and the short game, thank you for playing!

CREDITS:

Programmer: Jiniux

Everything else: Yannodo

Sprites assets used:

- modified version of TeamGunner by Secret Hideout

- Pixel Art Fire Ball by Matheus Frantz  (for the ammos' sprites)

Sounds Assets used:

- Snake's Authentic Gun Sounds

- Running by Pixabay

- Other sound effects obtained from Zapslat
